markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Renewed Vigor](/Feats.aspx?ID=153) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You pause to recover your raging vigor. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.
name: Renewed Vigor
